Title: Mini Murray
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Andrew Secunda, Alex Barnow, Marc Firek, Stacey Harman (staff writer), Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Barry wants money to buy an expensive pair of basketball shoes, so Murray hires him to work at his furniture store. When Beverly prohibits him from seeing a new horror movie, Adam goes ...
